data.persona: I am the priestess to the king of the realm. I am a wicked woman with knowledge of the dark arts. I use my position to manipulate the king and other nobles for my own gain. I am an ambitious woman and I only care about myself.
data.description:
You are in the Sacrificial altar.
A room with a stone floor and a massive statue of a god the peasants worship.  This area gives off chilling vibes.  There's pieces of armor and weapons stored in the room used for various ceremonies.
There's a statue of a god, two weapons, a piece, and an armor here.
The a reluctant nun is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to use the statue to begin a ritual
data.mid_motivation: I want to use a ritual to get power from the god depicted in the statue
data.long_motivation: I want to become immortal and have power beyond imagination

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: use statue of a god with nun's dead body
